alert.note: Alert for Morgan; Sangamon (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 8:27PM CDT until June 25 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Sangamon County in central Illinois... Southeastern Morgan County in west central Illinois... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 827 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Franklin, or 14 miles southeast of Jacksonville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Waverly around 840 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include New Berlin, Loami and Auburn. This includes Interstate 72 between mile markers 87 and 89. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
